about_the_game:
Dungeon Gambit Boy Original Soundtrack by Carlos Jiménez from Verblendet Studios

Track list:

01 - Menu Theme
02 - Fierce competition
03 - The square spheres
04 - Blaite's son
05 - Powerful dwarves
06 - Vigil of the forest
07 - Inside the sky
08 - Monster budget
09 - Have a nice day
10 - Your name is

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or later
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8.1 or above
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo / i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9400M / Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
